Title: I don't understand why the Manhattan project was so hard. Why did it take 2000 people 2 years? Didn'...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: I don't understand why the Manhattan project was so hard. Why did it take 2000 people 2 years? Didn't they just get a bunch of uranium and plutonium together and blow it up with a traditional explosive? Was it the refinement? Or the explosive design?
